attributes.action: Lowered age limit to 16 years old for voting
attributes.additional_details: We are forced to do exams at this age that decides our future and yet we aren't allowed to contribute our opinions on our own country that will also decide our futures
attributes.background: I believe that 16 year olds should have a say in the  democratic vote. Many 16 year olds feel like they should have a say in very important issues such as the EU referendum as it will affect our generation for the rest of our lives.
